desc.p: This file is to maintain the contract type changes. If there is any change in the CONTRACT.TYPE in MG then this file will get updated. This file contains CONTRACT.TYPE and CHANGE.DATE fields.
This field identifies the contract type change. The modified contract type is updated in this fiel.
The date on which the contract type is changed
